thread.title: This Insanely Talented Duo Perfectly Mashes Hit Songs to the Beat of Ed Sheeran's "Shape of You"
thread.title_full: This Insanely Talented Duo Perfectly Mashes Hit Songs to the Beat of Ed Sheeran's "Shape of You"

author: Caitlin Hacker
title: This Insanely Talented Duo Perfectly Mashes Hit Songs to the Beat of Ed Sheeran's "Shape of You"
text:
Conor Maynard Covers Ed Sheeran's "Shape of You" This Insanely Talented Duo Perfectly Mashes Hit Songs to the Beat of Ed Sheeran's "Shape of You" February 7, 2017 by Caitlin Hacker 108 Shares 
By now, you've probably memorized every word to Ed Sheeran's new hit "Shape of You." In addition to the catchy beat, the singer showed off a darker (and sexier) side to himself when he debuted the music video in late January. But the song was taken to a whole new level when British singer and YouTube star Conor Maynard had a sing-off to the tune against The Vamps in a Facebook video. The two quickly prove that so many other hit songs go perfectly with the song's beat, including ones from TLC, Shaggy, Beyoncé, Drake, and Sia. Get ready to wear out the repeat button on the video above. Related:
